name: hydrolytically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or involves hydrolysis (= a chemical reaction in which one substance reacts with water to produce another): The link must be hydrolytically stable to survive the initial steps of processing. These enzymes hydrolytically inactivate certain antibiotics, including penicillin. Related words
hydrolysis
hydrolytic
More examplesFewer examplesHydrolytically degradable polymers are usually used as implants in these situations.Hydrolytically stable carbides have been found in meteorites.We predicted that the polymer should hydrolytically degrade.
